author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1292.  Change 'bin/hadoop fs -get' to first copy files to a temporary name, then rename them to their final name, so that failures don't leave partial files.  Contributed by Tsz Wo Sze.

author: jleroux
msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 549972

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Jeremy Wickersheimer "Login process not reset properly after failure and hitting CLR in POS" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1091).

author: awiner
msg: And another PPR->XMLHttp bugfix:  chooseDate was broken.
- Provide an XMLHttp-based implementation of _firePartialRequest() (PPR via a GET)
- Fix presumably a pre-existing bug where after switching to another month in a chooseDate,
- Fix an unnecessary double-ampersand in chooseDate
